title: Does Roma Craft Tobac Make Nicaragua’s Best Cigars?
itunes:title: Does Roma Craft Tobac Make Nicaragua’s Best Cigars?
description:
They have some of the most vocal fans on social media, but does RoMa Craft Tobac make Nicaragua’s Best Cigars? We will sit down with Mike Rosales (Ro) and Skip Martin (Ma) and explore the company that makes Cromagnon, Aquitaine and Neanderthal.

The boys will offer their cigar review on the Intemperance Avarice and we will see how well Skip and Mike know each other after 10 years of making cigars together. We’ve all made fun of Barry’s spelling errors, and Skip has decided to challenge Barry to a cigar spelling bee.

In the second hour we reach deep into the cigar vault as we fire up a 2016 Cromagnon Firecracker and offer a cigar review on how it is smoking 3 years later. Dave has a way for you to get a couple of these, but you need to tune into the show to find out how.

Join us on The Cigar Authority, the most listened to cigar podcast in the world. We will have all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
